name: Petzl Corax LT Harness - Men's
description: Versatile and comfortable, the all-around Corax LT harness does it all. It's light enough for tough redpoint attempts, and packed with carry options for your multipitch, ice, or alpine ascents. Flexible rear gear loops won't interfere with a pack and the angled front loops make organizing and accessing gear easier.High-strength webbing and perforated closed-cell foam evenly distributes pressure.Pre-threaded double back buckle adjusts with a single pull.Elasticized leg loops stay snug without constricting.Polyester-reinforced tie-in points increase durability.
